trans-unit.source: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 指定一列，该列中每个单元格均包含一个表示布尔值的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>派生自`abstract`类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and <xref:System.DBNull.Value>.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>包含每个单元格中的复选框，默认情况下有三种状态： 检查 (`true`)、 未选中状态 (`false`)，和<xref:System.DBNull.Value>。

trans-unit.source: To use two-state check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用两个状态的复选框，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 添加到类属性包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性指定基础每个列的状态的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example first creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例首先创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>和将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When using this overload to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载创建时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>，请务必设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>值赋给<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example first creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例首先创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>和将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: 与该列关联的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> must be associated with a data source that contains <xref:System.Boolean> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>必须与包含的数据源相关联<xref:System.Boolean>值。

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>，首先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>返回适当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: 最后，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>以返回特定于<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>的列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>方法以返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is then used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>为<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>之后用于创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: 与该列关联的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the column as the default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将该列设置为默认，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />, and specifying whether the column style is a default column.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> 对 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 的新实例进行初始化，并指定列样式是否为默认列。

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>，首先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>返回适当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: 最后，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>以返回特定于<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>的列。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 操作被中断时所处行的行号。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: 发出请求以中断一个编辑过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null values are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许空值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if null values are allowed, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许空值，则为 <see langword="true" /> ；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to false, the check boxes in the column have only two states: checked (`true`) and unchecked (`false`).
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为 false 时，列中的复选框有只有两种状态： 检查 (`true`) 和 unchecked (`false`)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> of the edited column.
trans-unit.target: 已编辑列的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: 所编辑行的行号。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个请求以完成一个编辑过程。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing procedure committed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果编辑过程成功提交，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies a column that it must relinquish the focus to the control it is hosting.
trans-unit.target: 通知列必须放弃它承载的控件的焦点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 已编辑的单元格的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: The row number of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 已编辑的单元格的行号。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，控件将被放置在其中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格中将显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the cell for editing a value.
trans-unit.target: 准备单元格以便编辑值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the typical implementation of this method (as described in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Edit%2A> method does not site a control for editing the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 与此方法的典型实现不同 (如中所述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>类)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Edit%2A>方法不站点用于编辑单元格的值的控件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, a check box is drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 相反，绘制复选框时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Enters a <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> into the column.
trans-unit.target: 向列中输入 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: To set the actual value used when entering a null value, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置输入一个 null 值时使用的实际值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.EnterNullValue%2A> to enter a null value into the column.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.EnterNullValue%2A>列中输入一个 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将列值设置为 <see langword="false" /> 时使用的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>属性确定推送到数据源的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: 行号。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定行处的值。

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a column.
trans-unit.target: 获取列中单元格的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 16。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that draws on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 一个在屏幕上绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the value to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含要绘制到屏幕上的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height used when resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取调整列大小时使用的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height used to automatically resize cells in a column.
trans-unit.target: 用于自动调整列中单元格大小的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that draws the cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个绘制单元格的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The value that must fit in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 必须适合此单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格的最佳宽度和高度，此单元格包含特定值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the drawing information for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含单元格绘制信息的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A>方法允许您根据显示的值列的大小调整。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果单元格包含一个特别大的值，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A>方法以返回该单元格的最佳大小基于值。

trans-unit.source: The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
trans-unit.target: 将考虑在内不仅的字符串，而且还提供用于将其显示的字体大小的最佳大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将列值设置为 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> 时使用的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what text will be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定文本的内容将显示的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property must be set to true to enter null values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>属性必须设置为 true，以输入空值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>属性确定推送到数据源的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>。

trans-unit.source: Paints a column.
trans-unit.target: 绘制列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制到的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中绘画的外围 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row referred to in the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 在基础数据中引用的行号。

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> and row number.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" />、<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 和行号绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: This method paints the background with the background color in the graphics object passed in.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制与传入的图形对象的背景颜色的背景。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制到的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中绘画的外围 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的基础数据表中的行号。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，它指示内容是否为右对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容为右对齐，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, row number, and alignment settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" />、<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />、行号和对齐方式设置绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制到的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中绘画的外围 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: 所引用的基础数据表中的行号。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> used to paint the background color.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> used to paint the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，它指示内容是否为右对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容为右对齐，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, row number, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />, and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" />、<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />、行号、<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> 绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: Paints the check box in the column.
trans-unit.target: 绘制中列的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the column.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: 行号。

trans-unit.source: The value to set, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的值，类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a specified row.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定行的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将列值设置为 <see langword="true" /> 时使用的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>属性确定推送到数据源的实际值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue" /> property value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。
